did.unittitle: Later Draft, Version B.3, edited photocopy of Later Draft, Version B.1, p. 1-27.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Corresponds to Chapter 1. This photocopy has a distinctive appearance (different from other photocopies of the novel). Extensive pencil notes [perhaps by an editor] and notes in another hand [possibly Arnow's].
